string.value: #b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he has a favor to ask. Let's go see him.

#b#m102000000##k gets its water from other regions, as it has always been a region of very little moisture.

But as of late, the water supply has been cut off, resulting in a drought across Perion.

Go talk to #b#@9201120:##k, the plumber in #b#m103000000##k.
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says there might be a problem with the Water Pipe.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600 Able to proceed to 'Inspecting the Water Pipe' as next quest.

Look at how strong you've grown. You're resembling a Warrior more and more each time I see you. I called you here because I had a favor to ask.\nDo you want to hear what it is?\nWell, you'll have to do as I request either way, haha!

#b#m102000000##k is almost perfect, but it doesn't have enough water. So it gets its water from its neighbor, #b#m103000000##k. Victoria Island is just a caring place in which towns are willing to assist one another when necessary.
But the water supply has been decreasing. Won't you go and see what the problem is?\n\nFind #b#p9201120##k the plumber in #b#m103000000##k.
Oh, you must have come from #b#m102000000##k. Welcome.
Nice to meet you. My name is #b#p9201120##k, and I'm responsible for the plumbing.\n\nIs there a problem?
